Package arkivmester

Class TestView

java.lang.Object
arkivmester.Views
arkivmester.TestView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class TestView
extends Views
Handles the test view. Allows for observing subtests' statuses when the main test is running.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Magnus Sustad, Oskar Leander Melle Keogh, Esben Lomholt Bjarnason and Tobias Ellefsen

      selectedTests - Boolean list of selected tests.
      xQuery - True if XQueries are activated, false if deactivated.
